{{Infobox Berry |name = #65 Lansat |image = [[File:Lansat.png]] |caption = This is said to be a legendary Berry. Holding it supposedly brings great joy. |growtime = 24h 0m 0s |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |mutation = 0.001% |points = 15,000 |flavor =
*30 spicy *10 dry *30 sweet *10 bitter *30 sour }} '''Lansat''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 23 [[Roseli]] on the field. Pokémon #483 (Dialga) must be caught to unlock this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 hours || 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day - 5 days |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:LansatTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:LansatTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:LansatTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} ==== Ripening Time with Modifiers ==== {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 day -
5 days ||
--- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 16 hours -
80 hours ||
192 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 10 hours 40 mins -
53 hours 20 mins ||
128 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Lansat_Flow_Chart.png|350px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Lansat berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Roseli.png|30px]]

revision.comment: /* Possible Planting Formations */ Moved berries to center to better allow for increased growth and harvest rates of target.
